-- | EPUB E-Book construction support library
--   
--   EPUB E-Book Construction support library, for the details look at
--   http:<i></i>en.wikipedia.org<i>wiki</i>EPUB. This library is
--   depreciated, there is much better alterantive:
--   http:<i></i>hackage.haskell.org<i>package</i>epub-tools
--   http:<i></i>hackage.haskell.org<i>package</i>epub-metadata
@package epub
@version 0.0.7

module Codec.EBook.Types
data Book
Book :: String -> String -> String -> String -> [BookItem] -> Book
bookID :: Book -> String
bookTitle :: Book -> String
bookAuthor :: Book -> String
bookLang :: Book -> String
bookItems :: Book -> [BookItem]
data BookItem
BookItem :: String -> FilePath -> ByteString -> String -> Maybe Metadata -> BookItem
itemID :: BookItem -> String
itemFileName :: BookItem -> FilePath
itemContent :: BookItem -> ByteString
itemMediaType :: BookItem -> String
itemMetadata :: BookItem -> Maybe Metadata
data Metadata
ChapterMetadata :: String -> Metadata
chapterTitle :: Metadata -> String
emptyBook :: Book
addItem2Book :: Book -> BookItem -> Book
bookFiles :: Book -> [(FilePath, ByteString)]
chapterItems :: [BookItem] -> [BookItem]
str2bstr :: String -> ByteString
instance Show Metadata
instance Eq Metadata
instance Ord Metadata
instance Show BookItem
instance Eq BookItem
instance Ord BookItem
instance Show Book
instance Eq Book
instance Ord Book

module Codec.EBook.OPF
ncxXML :: Book -> ByteString
opfXML :: Book -> FilePath -> ByteString
opfFiles :: Book -> FilePath -> [(FilePath, ByteString)]


-- | Open Container Format 1.0
module Codec.EBook.OCF
defaultMediatype :: String
defaultMimetype :: String
containerXMLFile :: FilePath -> String -> (FilePath, ByteString)
containerXMLFile' :: FilePath -> (FilePath, ByteString)
mimetypeFile :: (FilePath, ByteString)

module Codec.EBook
book2Bin :: Book -> Integer -> ByteString
book2Bin' :: Book -> IO ByteString
book2Arch' :: Book -> IO Archive
book2Arch :: Book -> Integer -> Archive
opsMediatype :: String
